name: HSP_ACCT_BILL_DRG
description: This table contains billing diagnosis related group (DRG) information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account ID with associated billing DRG information.

columns.name: BL_DRG_COND_CODE
columns.description: This column stores the billing diagnosis-related group (DRG) condition code on the hospital account.

columns.name: BL_DRG_LOS
columns.description: This column stores the billing DRG length of service in days for the hospital account.

columns.name: BL_DRG_PAT_STATUS
columns.description: The patient status for the billing DRG on the hospital account.

columns.name: BL_DRG_ECCS
columns.description: The ECCS (episode clinical complexity score) associated with the billing DRG.
